heading: # Carousels
headingText: The `v-carousel` component is used to display large numbers of visual content on a rotating timer.
subComponentsList: `v-carousel-item`: The image container used by `v-carousel`. Extends `v-window-item`, is routable, and uses `v-img` in its default slot.
usageText: The `v-carousel` component expands upon `v-window` by providing additional features targeted at displaying images.

cycle.heading: ### Cycle
cycle.desc: With the **cycle** prop you can have your slides automatically transition to the next available every 6s (default).

custom-transition.heading: ### Custom transition
custom-transition.desc: The `v-carousel-item` component can have its **transition/reverse-transition** changed.

custom-icons.heading: ### Custom delimiters
custom-icons.desc: Use any available icon as your carousel's slide delimiter.

hide-delimiters.heading: ### Hide delimiters
hide-delimiters.desc: You can hide the bottom controls with `hide-delimiters` prop.

hide-controls.heading: ### Hide controls
hide-controls.desc: You can hide the carousel navigation controls with `:show-arrows="false"`.

model.heading: ### `v-model` control
model.desc: You can control carousel with model.

props.cycle: Determines if the carousel should cycle through images.
props.hideControls: Hides the navigation controls (left and right).
props.interval: The duration between image cycles. Requires the **cycle** prop.
props.nextIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the next item.
props.prevIcon: The displayed icon for forcing pagination to the previous item.
props.progress: Displays a carousel progress bar. Requires the **cycle** prop and **interval**.
props.progressColor: Applies specified color to progress bar.
props.showArrowsOnHover: Displays navigation arrows only when the carousel is hovered over.

events.change: Emitted when the component value is changed by user interaction
